name: Only 1% Challenges:Tricky Game
description:
Only 1% Challenges! is an enjoyable free game with various competitive challenges. You can test your all cognitive skills including reflexes, memory, brain, accuracy, focus, and IQ, and share your best results with your best friends. Addictive games bring your best and improve your competence. Better if you score and try to be in the top 1%. Begin with easy mechanics and set your baseline scores and compare yourself with the all players worldwide. Play fun gameplays and try to achieve new trophies. If you enjoy riddle games, word games, word search games, puzzles, sudoku puzzles, or quiz games, Only 1% Challenges! is the game for you!


Features:
• Enjoy these impossible levels.
• Daily challenges that will push you too hard
• Unexpected jokers to make your game easier
• Categories that will increase your gaming pleasure
• Exciting VS. mode
• Endless fun and master brain-pushing games.
• Great exercise to push your quickness.
Have fun!
publishers: ALICTUS YAZILIM EGITIM BILISIM TEKNOLOJILERI ELEKTRONIK SANAYI VE TICARET
